channel.title: Intro video Short Logo
channel.description:
I edited together a video logo short from 2 fan made trailers and added a few sound effects. Full credit goes to the original Authors / BMS Fan project videos materials to make the start up logo. It is very simple and just adds a little something.before the menu screen.
You may feel it is superfluous or not neccesary but It was just for fun and really does not effect loading times or at least not at all drastically
Draft version
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AUwFsujCeuY&feature=plcp[/url]
*EDIT LINK TAKEN DOWN*
Extract this file to BMS root directory and the video should play before the menu screen. If it does not play let me know because it works on my machine.
Enjoy :slight_smile: Hope you like it.
Edit: I would like to update this with the sound when you break a monitor in game but cannot seem to find it can anyone post it so I can update the video?

item.title: Intro video Short Logo
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
New improved Version here

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bkgD2Yunauw&feature=youtu.be

Sorry could not get this to be any bigger than 720 x 576 If somone wants to upscale this to a higher resolution then that would be helpfull I may do this later on

The original source file has a problem with it that is the problem I am having…

If you can live with the intro video being at 720 x 576 then you can add this file into the BMS directory and overwrite the media folder link below

https://www.mediafire.com/?nhhp0swm2pcs87t

The video will play when you start the game

Read full topic

item.description:
I think I gonna use this vid if u upload a high res vid of it

Read full topic

item.title: Intro video Short Logo
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
sersoft:

I tried it, appears in 640x480 format with wrong aspect ratio and not scaled to screen size, also it sounds pretty annoying with headphones on.

Yeah you are right it has come out low res for some reason I will try to fix this sorry but won’t be able too for a couple of days

dragunov2:

Just show us

Updated first post with the idea and draft but I plan to update this now sorry

I will make it 1280 x 720 same as the original video source

draft below

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AUwFsujCeuY&feature=plcp

If you have downloaded it and do not want it then just delete the video file in media named modintro

Read full topic

I edited together a video logo short from 2 fan made trailers and added a few sound effects. Full credit goes to the original Authors / BMS Fan project videos materials to make the start up logo. It is very simple and just adds a little something.before the menu screen.

You may feel it is superfluous or not neccesary but It was just for fun and really does not effect loading times or at least not at all drastically
